section.title: Overview
section.para: The Stop command simply ends a mission in GMAT. Whether placed in the script or GUI, Stop will halt the execution of the mission and have GMAT report back that the Command Sequence was intentionally interrupted.

section.title: Listing of Objects and Commands that interact

listitem.para: No Objects or Commands interact with Stop
